content: PBH S CRS M1 Sharp-point drywall screws Collated drywall screw (phosphate-coated) for the SD-M 1 or SD-M 2 screw magazine – for fastening drywall boards to wood ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Screws- - - ### FEATURES:Features Designed for use with SD-M 1 and SD-M 2 magazines and SD 4500-A22 and SD 4500 drivers High fastening frequency – get more done in less time Hilti has full control of the manufacturing process – delivering reliable, consistent quality All Hilti drywall stitch-point screws meet or exceed ASTM C 1002 performance requirements Collated screws for high-speed drywall installation with the SD-M 1 and SD-M 2 screw magazines Applications Fastening drywall boards to wood studs ### TECHNICAL DATA: Screw head type: Bugle head Screw drive/recess type: PH #2 Product Class: Premium Technical Data | Screw head type | Bugle head | Screw drive/recess type | PH #2 | Collated | Yes, compatible with SD-M 1 screw magazine, Yes, compatible with SD-M 2 screw magazine | Product Class | Premium | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor ### ITEMS- 2070968 -
